page.title: 17LEISURE TIME
page.content:
{class 7}found out that in their spare time children in our school play football,trackers,cricket,40 40 and tennis.There are quite a few clubs around the Green like Corby Drive Youth club, Egham Youth club, Runnymede Rovers football club,Mother and toddlers club,the Symonds stage school and some play groups.There are a lot of swings around the Green and we are very near Windsor Great Park.
{class 4}did a survey of their organised leisure time.We found that 4 went to brownies,4 went to cubs,3 go to guides,3 go to scouts,5 go to a sports club,3 go to dance classes,13 have swimming lessons,5 belong to a football club,6 go to gymnastics,8 attend church activities and 17 go to another type of club.The most popular categories was swimming.
